bug.author: manuelli
bug.summary: Use same normalization when displaying color maps for two different images
bug.description: Currently it normalizes each image <denchmark-link:https://github.com/peteflorence/pytorch-dense-correspondence/blob/af145643e3fc50bd570c02493e635d916973844d/dense_correspondence/evaluation/plotting.py#L12>independently</denchmark-link> . This means that comparing images visually is not very meaningful.

comments.comment: Yes good to create issue on it. If we are comparing across multiple scenes we might even want to normalize with min/max from all the images plotted in a single notebook
